unnormalised: Urban planning in India needs critical review. The haphazard growth in cities like Mumbai and Delhi, despite initiatives since 1992, highlights deficiencies. Consider the Dharavi redevelopment – stalled since 2004. Stringent enforcement of regulations, akin to the National Building Code 2016, is crucial. Proper Zonal Master Plans must be implemented by 10:00 hrs on 26/01/2024, for sustainable development, preventing further congestion & improving quality of life for all citizens, especially with focus on affordable housing initiatives near Kanpur.
